appName: Baseball Home Run : Hit & Pitch Fitness
displayName: Baseball Home Run : Hit & Pitch Fitness
display_name: Baseball Home Run : Hit & Pitch Fitness
display_long_description:
Get ready to swing for the fences in Baseball Home Run, the ultimate VR baseball experience on Meta Quest! Perfect your swing, improve your reflexes, and get a full-body workout in this immersive baseball simulation. Baseball Home Run combines realistic gameplay with fitness benefits, letting you experience the excitement of America’s favorite sport while burning calories and staying active.

Choose from multiple modes, including Home Run Derby, Batting Practice, and Skill Challenges, each designed to test and improve your baseball skills. Track your stats, set personal records, and compete against others on the leaderboard. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the game, Baseball Home Run offers intuitive controls and immersive environments that make every hit feel real.

This game is more than just fun – it's a workout. Improve your hand-eye coordination, build strength, and get your heart rate up as you go for that perfect hit. Baseball Home Run is designed for players of all fitness levels, with exercises that help tone muscles and build stamina while you enjoy the thrill of the game. Step into the batter’s box, take a swing, and feel the rush of hitting a home run in VR. Play for fitness, play for fun, and play to be the best. Are you ready to become the home run champion?
